name: Bumpy Blocks
description:
Bumpy Blocks is an action platformer where you must fight, dodge and weave your way through a force of sentient blocks over the course of 6 unique hand crafted levels. 

The game is roughly 10 - 15 minutes total playtime and great fun for skilled platformers and beginners alike.

Seizure Warning! entities will flash a bright colour when damaged. Player discretion is advised
